value.title: Pegasystems acquires Qurious.io to apply speech analytics to customer service
value.excerpt: Pegasystems has acquired Qurious.io to bring speech analytics to customer service interactions augmented by AI

value.title: Samsung's JetBot 90 AI+ Robot Vacuum Doubles as a Roving Security Camera
value.excerpt: The JetBot 90 AI+ works with the Samsung SmartThings app to let you access its integrated camera and keep an eye on your home from wherever you are.

value.title: LG’s 2021 OLED TVs are bigger, brighter, and built around AI
value.excerpt: LG has unveiled its 2021 OLED TV lineup. The range includes an extra-large C1, the brighter G1, and AI-driven features. LG isn’t just counting on its Mini LED TVs to lead its 2021 big-screen offerings.

value.title: AI devs claim they’ve created a robot that demonstrates a ‘primitive form of empathy’
value.excerpt: Columbia University researchers have developed a robot that displays a "glimmer of empathy" by visually predicting how another machine will behave.

value.title: Scientists use supercomputers and AI to determine how good (or deadly) your street drugs are

value.title: How AI Will Guide Corporations, Part 1: By Redefining Roles

value.title: Argus Research Analysts Highlight 5 Of Their Top Stock Picks For 2021
value.excerpt: Several leading experts from Argus reveal their favorite investment ideas for the year ahead — included as part of our annual MoneyShow 2021 Top Picks report.

value.title: Samsung unveils trio of new robots to help out around the house
value.excerpt: Samsung has unveiled a range of new robots designed to help out around the home – capable of filling the dishwasher and even pouring owners a glass of wine.

value.title: Baidu and Geely shack up to build electric cars in China
value.excerpt: What exactly the "intelligent" capabilities are, we don't know yet. Baidu created its Apollo self-driving car division in the past to research and develop autonomous car technology, however.

value.title: Meet the researcher creating more access with language

value.title: How AI is improving operational efficiencies across oil and gas, healthcare, and more
value.excerpt: Arificial intelligence is being used in many industries today, and it's only expanding. Here are some use cases to explain the challenges and benefits of AI adoption.

value.title: Stanford researchers design accelerator chip that speeds up AI inferencing
value.excerpt: Researchers at Stanford developed hardware that can run AI tasks quickly and energy-efficiently by melding eight cores into one AI engine.

value.title: Dina raises $7 million for its AI-powered at-home care platform
value.excerpt: Dina, a Chicago-based startup developing a platform to manage remote and at-home care, has raised $7 million in funding.

value.title: Samsung reveals smarter Family Hub fridge and a robo-vac that thinks it’s a guard dog

value.title: Samsung's new washers and dryers use AI to clean your clothes more efficiently
value.excerpt: Samsung announced a new series of front-load washers and dryers that use artificial intelligence to reduce the time it takes to clean your clothes. The new models are part of the Samsung 8800 Series that sit near the top of the 2021 range and will be the only models to use the new AI-powered Optiwash mode.

value.title: Microsoft's Power BI and DirectQuery: Making data analysis and visualisation easier
value.excerpt: Mixing datasets to generate complex insights can help even the smallest organisation maximise business value from its data.

value.title: Chinese search giant Baidu teams up with Geely to build electric cars
value.excerpt: Hong Kong (CNN Business)Chinese search giant Baidu is teaming up with carmaker Geely to build electric vehicles, the latest move by a tech company to shape the future of the autos industry.

value.title: AI Drug Discovery Startup Valo Raises $190 Million And Unveils Cancer Therapy Programs
value.excerpt: The Boston-based company aims to accelerate the drug discovery process for cancer therapies that are both more effective and less toxic.

value.title: NIO teams up with Nvidia, Qualcomm in self-driving car development

value.title: Could Artificial Intelligence Be The Future Of Fertility Treatment?
value.excerpt: Scientists are working on embryo analysis with computer algorithms to help build families. Artificial intelligence could lead to massive developments in IVF.
